title: Shutdown
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Don Hopkins, David Springbett and Laura Sky
brief_description: Documents the closing-down of an American-owned branch plant with all the personal trauma that such a decision causes to the workers. The employees discuss the dilemma of working in an economy dominated by foreign ownership and the lack of government action to protect jobs in American-owned branch plants.
